type.name: org.gradle.tooling.events.test.JvmTestOperationDescriptor

method.name: getMethodName
method.description:
Returns the name of the test method, if any.

returns:The name of the test method.

method.name: getJvmTestKind
method.description:
Returns what kind of test this is.

returns:The test kind.

method.name: getClassName
method.description:
Returns the name of the test class, if any.

returns:The name of the test class.

method.name: getSuiteName
method.description:
Returns the name of the test suite, if any.

returns:The name of the test suite.

property.name: methodName
property.description:
Returns the name of the test method, if any.

returns:The name of the test method.

property.name: jvmTestKind
property.description:
Returns what kind of test this is.

returns:The test kind.

property.name: className
property.description:
Returns the name of the test class, if any.

returns:The name of the test class.

property.name: suiteName
property.description:
Returns the name of the test suite, if any.

returns:The name of the test suite.
